front.title: Signalling DHCPv6 Prefix Delegation Availability to Hosts

abstract.t: This document defines a "P" flag in the Prefix Information Option of IPv6 Router Advertisements (RAs). The flag is used to indicate that the network prefers that hosts do not use the prefix provided in the PIO for SLAAC but request a prefix via DHCPv6 PD instead, and use that delegated prefix to form addresses.
